entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
